Colorless to light yellow liquid under roo temperature , easily soluble in water, methanol and many other organic solvents, and crystallizes below 13 ℃, chenmically active and easily hydrolyzed and polymerized. N-vinylpyrrolidone is widely used in adhesives, textiles, wood, paper, plastic UV coationgs ,pharmaceuticals, and also commonly used in homopolymers (PVPK series) and copolymers (VA series)
